articles.author: Coingape Staff
articles.title: Crypto Prices Today April 16: Bitcoin Dips To $62K, Ethereum At $3000, SOL Crashes - CoinGape
articles.description: The crypto prices today experience a major slump as Bitcoin traded near $62,000 while Ethereum approaches a slump below $3,000 as Solana crashed.

articles.author: Harry Dempsey
articles.title: Aluminium and nickel prices surge after sanctions on Russian supply - Financial Times
articles.description: UK and US measures ban delivery of new Russian-origin metals to LME and CME
articles.content: Aluminium posted its biggest intraday gain since at least 1987 and nickel and copper prices also rose after the UK and US introduced sanctions that in effect ban the trading of new Russian supplies o… [+2803 chars]
